title: LEGO The Incredibles + DLC
body:
LEGO The Incredibles + DLC


Genres/Tags: Action, Third-person, 3D
Companies: TT Games, Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI13
Original Size: 13.8 GB
Repack Size: from 4.6 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet] ENG VO only
  • FreeTorrents ENG VO only
  • Tapochek.net ENG VO only
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on LEGO.The.Incredibles-CODEX ISO release: codex-lego.the.incredibles.iso (14,850,260,992 bytes)
  • Unlike most of my repacks this one is 100% Lossless but NOT MD5 Perfect: game resources were unpacked
  • Parr Family Vacation Character Pack DLC is included and activated
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature – you can skip downloading and installing of voice packs you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 13.8 to 4.6~6.3 GB, depending on selected voicepacks)
  • Installation takes 12-20 minutes (depending on your system and selected voicepacks)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 25 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Experience the thrilling adventures of the Parr family as they conquer crime and family life through both Disney-Pixar films The Incredibles and Incredibles 2, in a LEGO® world full of fun and humor. LEGO® The Incredibles allows players to explore action-packed story levels and an epic hub world – including Municiberg, as they use their unique “Super” abilities to bring the city’s Super Villains to justice. Gamers can also team up with family and friends in 2 player co-op to assemble incredible LEGO® builds!
You can skip downloading of speech packs you don’t need. Here is the list of selective files:
  • fg-selective-english.bin (a MUST for English, Russian and other languages without their own voicepack)
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-polish.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German language only – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-11).
